About Me

About

Who is this guy, anyway?

  • 1998 - 2002

    Humble Beginnings

    Attended college at the University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia. Finished with triple Bachelor of Science degrees in Finance (Wharton), Computer Science (Engineering) and Mathematics (College).

  • September 2006

    Bloomberg

    After a short gig at a web startup in Washington DC, I joined Bloomberg LP as a Financial Software Developer. This is where I currently work, as a Technical Lead in Equity Derivatives.

  • May 2010

    Masters from NYU

    While working at Bloomberg I attended NYU's Courant Institute, earning a Master of Science degree in Financial Mathematics. This program is the de facto #1 quant school in America.

  • 2010 - Present

    Soccer

    One of my biggest passions in life is soccer. Not only do I captain and coach teams in New York City, but also have won several cups while making lifetime lasting friendships.

  • See
    Full
    Resume!

Animated Header

Responsive on-scroll header component

On scroll animated header using jQuery. It animates a fixed header's size on scroll.

  • Demo: https://animated-header.herokuapp.com
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/animated-header

Chat

Feature rich chat application

This is a fully working web chat application. It's a feature rich, client/server Javascript/Java app with smileys, sounds, blinker, standard & custom buddy icons, offline messages, translations, and so forth.

  • Demo: https://cairo.peterszocs.com
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/cairo-chat

© 2015-08-18 Apache License 2.0

Desktop

Full blown Chromebook application

I wrote this web app before chromebooks and chrome existed. It started as a business project idea in college at the Wharton School at UPenn. The idea was to create a web application that would replace one's need for a full blown laptop or desktop. It has integrated file system, photos, music playback, and the usual things you would expect from any modern day OS.

  • Demo: https://desktop.zlocker.com
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/desktop

© 2015-08-18 Apache License 2.0

Old Personal Website

This was my old personal website

This was my first website. It features Resume, Photos, Music and Contact sections with a fully working contact form.

  • Demo: https://old.szocs.info
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/old.peterszocs.com

© 2015-08-18 Apache License 2.0

Personal Website

Source of this website

This is my personal website. It features several content sections, a responsive portfolio grid with hover effects, full page portfolio item modals, photos, music and a working contact form.

  • Demo: https://www.peterszocs.com
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/peterszocs.com

© 2015-08-18 Apache License 2.0

Tech Hub

Issue tracking system

Tech Hub is an issue tracking system. Just as JIRA, Bugzilla and many others, it supports issue tracking on different projects by various users. Administrators have access to additional features such as progress reports on issues, projects and so forth.

  • Demo: https://hub.zlocker.com
  • Source: https://github.com/pitanyc/tech-hub

© 2015-08-18 Apache License 2.0
